name: Example Event
description: Just a description

name: Ingredient Triggered Events
prerequisiteEvents: leave this row empty to be a heading for yourself

name: Radio Ad
acceptText: Offer a $1 discount on drinks and run the ad
rejectText: Nice try, no one listens to radio anymore.
description: For $1000 La Buena Boca! 104.1FM will run a 8-week ad for you

name: TV Ad
acceptText: There's no such thing as bad publicity!.
description: The radio ad brought a load of boomers to the bar.  The owner is now considering starring in their own TV ad following the radio success

name: Viral Video!
description: The TV ad went viral!  The owner filmed the entire thing with their nephew resulting in a halarious montage of bloopers hitting the web.

name: Summer Spritz
description: O-pearl bitter wants placement on your menu and are willing to pay

name: Damn Hippies
description: Some Hippies went running naked in the elderflower fields of the french alps. The plants are now under quarantine. Elderflower liqueur prices spike.

name: Damn Hippies
description: The elderflower plants have been released after being cleared of any diseases and extensive emotional therapy.  You can go back to drinking their blood at regular prices.

name: Orgeat, more like B-orgeat
acceptText: It's fine, pump out those drinks!
rejectText: Clean out the well and get new ice
description: The bartenders spilled orgeat in the ice well.

name: Severe Allergic Reaction!
description: You just triggered a guests nut allergy due to your poor standards.  That's gonna cost you

name: Falernum? I barely know him!
acceptText: Apricot kernels are a great substitute
rejectText: Leave out the almonds for now
description: You have run out of almonds to make your falernum, use apricot kernels instead?

name: Cyanide Poisoning!
description: Those apricot kernels contain cyanide and you put way too much in. Say hello to your first lawsuit!

name: Sherry Shortage
description: A popular local spanish pintxo bar has run the city dry of sherry.  The owner suggests using white port instead

name: The Port Flow-eth
description: Turns out nobody wanted sherry cocktails in the first place.  Good call!

name: Vodka Pays the Bills
acceptText: Have the bartenders put away the product
description: Blue Swan vodka is impressed with how much of their product has been sold in your bar.  They have dropped off a few extra cases of their vodka

name: Theft does NOT pay the bills
description: Your bartenders forgot to lock up the booze after stocking and the room was cleaned out.

name: Who drinks Baijiu?
rejectText: Apologize, remove baijiu from the menu
description: Owner "What the hell were you thinking putting baijiu on the menu, nobody wants to drink that expensive piss"

name: A Compromiser
description: It's good to compromise every once in a while. You can't win them all. The owner appreciates you listening to their feedback, even when it's delivered with the grace of a rhino.

name: Good luck, kid.
description: You just got fired standing up for baijiu.  BAIJIU!!  Good luck, kid.  You're gonna need it.

name: Phylloxera 2, Electric Boogaloo
description: The deadly bug that ruined the grape industry decades ago has returned to devastate vines.  Cognac spikes in price

name: Phylloxera 3, The Grape Escape
description: Scientists have killed the phylloxera bug and markets normalize.  Country music killed them in the end, basically Mars Attacks! but with grape juice.

name: Plastic Sword Lawsuit
acceptText: Pay and dispose of all weapons
description: One of your guests is suing after poking their eye trying to pick their teeth with a plastic sword.

name: FIRE! FIRE!
description: One of your bartenders set a guests hair on fire while performing a mediocre flair routine

name: Straws Kill Turtles
description: A demonstration happens outside your bar because of all the turtles you're killing by using straws. Murderer.

name: Grappa Saviour!
description: Italians are impressed with your use of Grappa in a cocktail as they've only been using it as jet fuel and feature you in a local publication

name: Scurvy!
description: Your shipment of limes has been burned at the border after testing positive for scurvy.

name: One Bad Apple Ruined the Bunch
description: You left an apple in the walk-in during the long weeked.  It rotted and ruined everything in the fridge, even your pack of emergency twinkies.

name: Order Error: Rhubarb
description: Someone in the kitchen thought the rhubarb was red celery and diced it all up with the mire-poix.

name: Rhubarb soup!?
acceptText: You win some, you lose some?
description: Owner "That Rhubarb soup was absolutely disgusting. What were you thinking!?"

name: Order Error: Diet Cola
acceptText: Run a Rum & Diet special this month
description: Neglecting inventory has left you with a massive surplus of expired Diet Cola syrup. Who needs this much of anything?

name: Rum & Di-arrhea
description: Your little stunt with the expired cola syrup ended with multiple guests getting the "violent tuesday susans."  You're lucky to still have a job.

name: Waste not!
acceptText: Run those babies through the washer!
rejectText: Banana dolphins die everyday, not my problem.
description: No one is eating the banana dolphins, a lot is going in the garbage

name: Want not!
acceptText: It seemed like a good idea at the time...
description: Someone posted a video of the banana dolphins being rinsed and re-used.

name: Surprise Tepache!
description: Your bar team prepped too much pineapple and it fermented

name: Revenge of the Sugarless Bear Gummies
description: People hate the gummy garnish. "The only place these god forsaken hell bears belong are buried deep below the Earth's surface" - Luke

name: Lemonade Startup
description: A mysterious stranger loves the lemon flavour in your drink.  He tells you about the successful lemonade startup he once sold, tips $100, and walks out

name: Randomly Triggered Events
prerequisiteEvents: leave this row empty to be a heading for yourself

name: Cake Day!
rejectText: I'm more of a pie person
description: You've been invited to the break room to enjoy some celebratory cake.  No one will tell you why.

name: The Worst Kind of Cake
description: There was no cake, it was all a lie.  You've been fired.

name: Trip to the Walk-In
rejectText: Back off, get your own sandwich
description: The owner's spouse has asked you to meet them in the walk-in fridge

name: Where the Sausage is made
description: SURPRISE, Happy Birthday!  The owner slips you a cool 10k expecting you to pump it back into the business

name: Owners Friend Wants a Table
description: There is a dude demanding a VIP booth saying he's the owners brother

name: Brotherly Love
description: He was, in fact, the owners brother and dude balled out HARD!

name: Pay-Per-View Fight
rejectText: We're not that kind of bar
description: A big MMA fight is coming up on Pay-per-view

name: Bar Fight
description: Dude-bros went nuts and trashed the bar during the MMA fight

name: Unwanted Visitor
acceptText: He probably just needs a drink
description: An unwanted visitor has shown up slurring his words and stumbling around the bar

name: Send Back:  Tastes Funny
rejectText: "You wanted cream in a dry martini"
description: "This drink tastes funny, I want a new one"

name: Send Back: Not Enough Booze
description: "Broh, it doesn't even taste like vodka.  Top me up"

name: Send Back: Not My Drink
rejectText: "No, you picked up someone elses drink"
description: "You gave me someone elses drink"

name: Noise Complaint
rejectText: "You chose to live above a bar..."
description: Your upstairs neighbour left a voicemail complaining about the noise

name: Player Triggered Events
prerequisiteEvents: leave this row empty to be a heading for yourself

name: To Soda or not To Soda
description: Eddie has been drinking a lot of sodas lately.

name: Domino Effect
acceptText: Make Ashley work in bubble wrap
description: All the glassware has broken. Hammer-hands, Ashley, strikes again

name: No Show
description: Marco didn't show up to work today

name: No Show
description: Marco didn't show up to work again

name: No Show
description: Marco's is a no show, yet again...

name: Termination without Representation!
description: Without proper documentation, Marco needs to be paid out

name: HR
description: Rumors have begun to come up regarding Bear mistreating some of the staff.

name: Swift justice
description: Great job swiftly stepping in when you smelled smoke. There's no place for harassment and Bear has been appropriately reprimanded.

name: Suspicious
rejectText: Send an ambiguous email about theft
description: Theodore was seen leaving storage with a bottle shaped lump in his jacket

acceptText: Pay him to forget this ever happened
description: It was a water bottle.  Theo feels personally attacked
